00040 #ifndef _worldquerytool_cpp
00041 #define _worldquerytool_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "worldquerytool.h"
00044 
00045 namespace phys
00046 {
00047     WorldQueryTool::WorldQueryTool(World* GameWorld_)
00048     {
00049         this->GameWorld = GameWorld_;
00050         this->MouseButtonCache.reset();
00051         this->KeyboardButtonCache.reset();
00052         this->MouseXCache=0;
00053         this->MouseYCache=0;
00054     }
00055 
00056     WorldQueryTool::~WorldQueryTool()
00057     {
00058 
00059     }
00060 
00061     Whole WorldQueryTool::GetMouseX()
00062         {return this->MouseXCache;}
00063 
00064     Whole WorldQueryTool::GetMouseY()
00065         {return this->MouseYCache;}
00066 
00067     bool WorldQueryTool::IsMouseButtonPushed(short unsigned int MouseButton)
00068     {
00069         if(MouseButton >= this->MouseButtonLimit || MouseButton<0)
00070             {GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Unsupported mouse button access through WorldQueryTool");}
00071         return this->MouseButtonCache[MouseButton];
00072     }
00073 
00074     bool WorldQueryTool::IsKeyboardButtonPushed(MetaCode::InputCode KeyboardButton)
00075         {return this->KeyboardButtonCache[KeyboardButton];}
00076 
00077 }

00079 
00080 
00081 #endif
